body:
How could I get the message status of a specific message's ID once a message is sent to receiver?

I have try 
$w->eventManager()->bind("onMessageReceivedClient","onClientReceipt");

but it only shown the previous messages status. While the
$w->eventManager()->bind("onMessageReceivedServer", "onServerReceived");

did shown the message status received by the WA server. 

Is there any way I could immediately get the message status sent? Like first tick or the receiver does not have WA account yet?

I am thinking of getting the message status later after a message was sent but I can't figured out which function I should use. Is there any proper complete documentation for this API? 

Could there any function that return message status for specific message ID like example : 

$w->eventManager()->bind->("onMessageReceiveClientSpecID", "functionListener",$uniqueID);

Please help. Thanks in advance.
title: Get Specific Message ID receive status
